author: Megan Rose Dickey
title: Instacart shoppers are planning a nationwide strike to demand better safety protections and pay amid COVID-19
description: Instacart shoppers, led by the folks over at Gig Workers Collective, are planning a nationwide strike in protest of the company’s practices amid the COVID-19 pandemic, Vice first reported. Shoppers, who are responsible for grocery shopping and deliveries, say…
